name: Centered Youtubes(Medium player made Large)
description:
Centers youtube so you dont have to live with google's decision to left align youtube.
This version makes the "medium" player as big as the "large" player If you're as me and want it like that all the time.
additional_info:
Feel free to email any complaints and bugs(if I missed a underpage or something like that) to nils.t.olofsson@gmail.com

last update:
Fixed bug with html5 player
